text.section: Subject to KRS 118.555, on the first Tuesday after the third Monday in May, in each presidential election year, the Commonwealth of Kentucky shall conduct presidential preference primary elections within each political party.
Hours of voting shall be in accordance with KRS 118.035.
The cost of election, officials, and the entire method of conducting the presidential preference primary shall be in accordance with Kentucky statutory provisions on primary elections.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 431, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986.
